conbody.p: The status of the editor is displayed using graphic indicators. They inform the user about things such as:
When the editor is in the main pane, the indicators are located in the Navi pane. A Data query that resides in a pop-up window has its indicators within the window.

fig.title: Editing indicators a) in the Navi pane and b) above the editor field in a pop-up window

section.title: Using editing indicators in C++ applications
section.p: The API to use for editing indicators is the Indicators API. For the navi pane, use the Navigation pane API.
